name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character.
BEAKED REQUIRES THE STSLIB MOD!

0.5.9:
- Fixed Reverse Withering campfire bug.
- Molting no longer blocks 2x with one card in hand.
0.5.8: 
- Fix for Crazy Rituals crashes.
0.5.7:
- New Super Rare Boss Relic: Sacred Deck.
- New Elite card - Reptomancer's Bite.
- New card - Vigor Burst.
- New potion - Mending Brew.
- Reverse Withering is now free once per rest site.
- Huntress Essence no longer draws more on upgrade.
- Resilience now also causes 4 HP loss.
- Ritual of Body now requires & spends Ritual.
- Ruin Sticks is now 1-cost and 17 damage.
- Redirect can now remove negative Strength.
- Added config options to disable Super-Rare relics.
- Rapid-fire attack/heal animations are much faster.
- Book's Flurry effect clarified.
- Crazy Rituals now prints info to console.
- ...and more, check the release notes!

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
